00046 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 void DIV_TestFun1(void);
00048 void DIV_TestFun2(void);
00049 void DIV_TestFun3(void);
00050 
00051 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 u32 ua, ub, uc, uRemainder;
00053 s32 sa, sb, sc, sRemainder;
00054 
00055 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00056 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00057   * @brief  Main program.
00058   * @retval None
00059   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00060 int main(void)
00061 {
00062   RETARGET_Configuration();
00063 
00064   printf("\r\n\r\n");
00065 
00066   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00067     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00068     CKCUClock.Bit.DIV = 1;
00069     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00070   }
00071 
00072   DIV_TestFun1();
00073   DIV_TestFun2();
00074 
00075   while (1)
00076   {
00077     DIV_TestFun3();
00078   }
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00083   * @brief  Div Test function.
00084   * @retval None
00085   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00086 void DIV_TestFun1(void)
00087 {
00088   /* 31-bit Unsigned division, maximum input value is 0x7FFFFFFF (2147483647, 31-bit)                       */
00089   ua = 52352;
00090   ub = 3;
00091   uc = DIV_Div32(ua, ub);
00092   uRemainder = DIV_GetLastRemainder();
00093   printf("Unsigned 31-bit %u / %u = %u, Remainder = %u\r\n\r\n", ua, ub, uc, uRemainder);
00094 
00095   ua = 2147483647;
00096   ub = 2147483640;
00097   uc = DIV_Div32(ua, ub);
00098   uRemainder = DIV_GetLastRemainder();
00099   printf("Unsigned 31-bit %u / %u = %u, Remainder = %u\r\n\r\n", ua, ub, uc, uRemainder);
00100 
00101   /* 32-bit Unsigned division                                                                               */
00102   ua = 52352;
00103   ub = 3;
00104   uc = DIV_uDiv32(ua, ub);
00105   uRemainder = DIV_uGetLastRemainder();
00106   printf("Unsigned 32-bit %u / %u = %u, Remainder = %u\r\n\r\n", ua, ub, uc, uRemainder);
00107 
00108   ua = 0x84663548;           // 2221290824
00109   ub = 0x1ACF;               // 6863
00110   uc = DIV_uDiv32(ua, ub);   // ua / ub = (x / ub) + (0x7FFFFFFF / ub), where ua = x + 0x7FFFFFFF
00111   uRemainder = DIV_uGetLastRemainder();
00112   printf("Unsigned 32-bit %u / %u = %u, Remainder = %u\r\n\r\n", ua, ub, uc, uRemainder);
00113 
00114   ua = 0x80000002;           // 2147483650
00115   ub = 0x80000001;           // 2147483649
00116   uc = DIV_uDiv32(ua, ub);   // ua / ub = 1...(ua - ub), where ua and ub > 0x7FFFFFFF
00117   uRemainder = DIV_uGetLastRemainder();
00118   printf("Unsigned %u / %u = %u, Remainder = %u\r\n\r\n", ua, ub, uc, uRemainder);
00119 
00120   /* Signed division                                                                                        */
00121   sa = 52241;
00122   sb = -4;
00123   sc = DIV_Div32(sa, sb);
00124   sRemainder = DIV_GetLastRemainder();
00125   printf("Signed %d / %d = %d, Remainder = %d\r\n\r\n", sa, sb, sc, sRemainder);
00126 
00127   sa = -52241;
00128   sb = 9;
00129   sc = DIV_Div32(sa, sb);
00130   sRemainder = DIV_GetLastRemainder();
00131   printf("Signed %d / %d = %d, Remainder = %d\r\n\r\n", sa, sb, sc, sRemainder);
00132 
00133   /* Mod operation                                                                                          */
00134   sa = 52241;
00135   sb = -6;
00136   sc = DIV_Mod(sa, sb);
00137   printf("Signed %d mod %d = %d\r\n\r\n", sa, sb, sc);
00138 }
00139 
00140 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00141   * @brief  Div Test function.
00142   * @retval None
00143   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00144 void DIV_TestFun2(void)
00145 {
00146   /* You cna also set the "DIV_ENABLE_DIVIDE_BY_ZERO_CHECK = 1" to check the divide by zero case            */
00147   /* (stop at foreverloop)                                                                                  */
00148   sc = DIV_Div32(100, 0);
00149   sRemainder = DIV_GetLastRemainder();
00150   printf("Signed 100 / 0 = %d, Remainder = %d\r\n", sc, sRemainder);
00151   if (DIV_IsDivByZero() == TRUE)
00152   {
00153     printf("Divide by zero occurred! The quotient is not meaningful!\r\n");
00154   }
00155 }
00156 
00157 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00158   * @brief  Div Test function.
00159   * @retval None
00160   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00161 void DIV_TestFun3(void)
00162 {
00163   printf ("\r\nPlease input integer....\r\n");
00164 
00165   printf("Dividend=");
00166   scanf("%d", &sa);
00167   printf("%d", sa);
00168 
00169   printf("\r\nDivisor=");
00170   scanf("%d", &sb);
00171   printf("%d", sb);
00172 
00173   sc = DIV_Div32(sa, sb);
00174 
00175   printf("\r\n%d / %d = %d\r\n\r\n", sa, sb, sc);
00176 }

00188      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.

00190      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00191   */

00194   {
00195   }
